petsSection.title: Lost or Found a Pet?
petsSection.paragraph: Use our app to share details with people nearby, get updates from the community on sightings, and increase the chances of a safe return.

servicesSection.title: Pet Services Near You
servicesSection.paragraph: Find trusted pet services – from grooming and training to veterinary care. Browse guides, discover local providers, and get the support your pet needs.

guidesSection.title: Practical pet care tips
guidesSection.paragraph: Learn how to best care for your pet – from daily care to emergency situations. Practical tips, guides, and answers to important questions all in one place.

supportSection.title: Digital Support
supportSection.subtitle: How exactly do we help you?

items.title: Inclusion on our website
items.description: Your pet is added to our page, making reporting observations especially convenient.

items.title: Printable poster
items.description: Receive a professionally designed lost pet poster with QR code.

items.title: Receive observation reports
items.description: Check new observations reported by the community to track leads about your pet.

items.title: Push notifications
items.description: Receive instant alerts when a lost or found pet is reported in your vicinity.

items.title: Technology that unites pet lovers
items.description: Our application connects people with a common goal – to help find lost pets. A community that collaborates and cares.

items.title: Mobile-optimized platform
items.description: Whether using a phone or tablet – our platform is adapted for comfortable and fast use on all devices.

items.title: App experience – in browser
items.description: Add our platform to your device's home screen and use it like a real app. No download needed.

items.title: Artificial Intelligence for your pet's benefit
items.description: Our AI assistant answers questions about pets – from daily care to emergencies.

postManagementSection.title: Smart and convenient post management
postManagementSection.description: Thanks to the convenient design and filters, searching among posts becomes simple and pleasant. Save posts to your profile so you can easily track their status at any time.
